SUM(bar)
Sum(bar)
Count(bar)
Count(Customers)
Sum({$}bar)
Count({$}Customers)
Sum({1}bar)
Sum({1<foo>}bar)
Sum({1<Year=foo>}bar)
Sum({$}Sales)
Sum({$}Sales)
Count({$}Customer)
Sum({1}Sales)
x Sum({BM01}Sales)
Sum({$1}Sales)
Sum({1-$}Sales)
Sum({$_1}Sales)
Sum({$_2}Sales)
Sum({$_4}Sales)
Sum({$1}Sales)
Sum({$2}Sales)
Sum({$5}Sales)
x Sum({$}ItemsSold*ItemPrice)
